name: Don't Touch My Devil Baby! (fixed)
description:
Run and Gun where you need to take damage to save your baby AND you have no weapon!

It’s Halloween. You are a single parent holding your child, trying to get home after a long day of work. Teens roam the streets everywhere hopped up on sugar, waiting to hurl eggs at anyone they deem uncool… you are the perfect target.

The Game

Get through the level without you or your baby sustaining egg-death. The higher your baby’s health at the end of the level, the higher your score.

The player must manage their health bar against the health bar of their baby. They must take more damage so the baby takes less.

Creative Direction, Game Design, Level Design by Michael Pilatzkie (TheHeck)

Programming, Level Design by Sammi3

Art by Cunha

Music and SFX by Jack31

Writing by bookfan123
